content: Fix KeyError issues by updating tests to use correct fixture names - replace 'users["owner"]' with 'test_users["owner"]' or proper fixture
Create sample fixtures (hunt, location, report) that use the correct user from friendship_setup instead of generic 'user' fixture
Test the is_visible_to_user() methods directly to ensure they work correctly with proper user relationships
Run the complete test file to verify all privacy model tests pass
